Sentence 1:
<english>One thing that most touched my heart was that she would go to whoever was sick and just be with them.</english>
<chinese>最让我感动的一件事是，谁生病了，她就会去谁那儿并和他们待在一起。</chinese>
语法笔记: 本句的主干是 One thing was that。定语从句 that most touched my heart 修饰先行词 thing;第二个 that 引导表语从句 that she would go to...with them，表语从句中，谓语 动词 go 和 be with 由 and 连接，构成并列谓语;whoever 引导宾语从句，做 go to 的 宾语。
核心词表:
<word>touch</word> <phonetic>英:/tʌtʃ/ 美:/tʌtʃ/</phonetic>
vt.触动，感动，使动心 n.触摸，接触;联系 
<specil>搭配</specil> get in touch (with)(和...)取得联系 be/keep/stay in touch (with)(和...)保持联系 
<specil>派生</specil> touched adj.感动的
untouched adj.未触及的;不受感动的

<word>whoever</word> <phonetic>英:/hu:ˈevə/ 美:/huˈɛvɚ/</phonetic>
pron.无论谁

<word>sick</word> <phonetic>英:/sɪk/ 美:/sɪk/</phonetic>
adj.有病的，患病的，不舒服的;(想)呕吐的 
<specil>记忆 联想记忆</specil>:时钟滴答(tick)，烦躁想吐(sick) 
<specil>派生</specil> sickness n.疾病，不健康

Sentence 2:
<english>Only by increasing the number of doctors by 50 percent can the patients be treated properly in this hospital.</english>
<chinese>只有将医生的人数增加 50%，才能使病人们在这家医院得到充分的治疗。</chinese>
语法笔记: 本句的主干是 can the patients be treated properly。"only+状语"放在句首时，句子要 部分倒装，by increasing the number of doctors by 50 percent 是方式状语; can 是谓语 中的情态动词，因倒装前置，正常语序应该是 the patients can be treated properly in this hospital。

<english>sure, it's great to write about a tourist attraction, but you'd better get the local museum hours correct or you could really ruin someone's vacation.</english>
<chinese>当然，写一篇关于旅游胜地的文章很不错，但你最好把当地博物馆开放的时间写准确， 否则你可能真的会毁了某些人的假期。</chinese>

Sentence 33:
<english>While small may be beautiful, tall is just plain uncomfortable it seems，particularly when it comes to staying in hotels and eating in restaurants.</english>
<chinese>个子矮小还可能是美丽的，而个子高大似乎就非常不方便了，特别是在旅馆住宿和在餐厅用餐的时候。</chinese>
语法笔记: 句首 While 做并列连词，表示对比两种事物。前一分句的主干是 small may be beautiful， 后一分句的主干是 it seems，其中 it 是形式主语，真正的主语是主语从句 tall is just plain uncomfortable。when 引导时间状语从句， it comes to 是固定用法，后面接名词性 成分，表示“说起...来，就...而论”;动名词短语 staying in hotels 和 eating in restaurants 由 and 构成并列结构。
